feature.label: Eclipse Layout Kernel (Incubation) - UI Components
feature.description: The Eclipse Layout Kernel provides automatic layout to diagram editors and viewers. It provides a layout graph format and an infrastructure that editors / viewers on one side and layout algorithms on the other side can connect to. The Eclipse Layout Kernel also provides layout algorithms.
